text: @JoeBiden The USA needs a COMPETENT leader if you want any chance of conquering the virus. He is incapable, let alone competent. Lockdown will save lives, even flatten the curve. Look at NZ - Covid-19 is almost eradicated here, because @jacindaardern is a highly competent & decent leader
